element.name: EMS Professional (Crew Member) ID
element.definition: The ID number of the EMS Crew Member associated with eOther.03, eOther.05, eOther.06.
element.v3Comment: Added to allow documentation of PPE and work related health and safety down to the individual level within each EMS crew.
element.v3Changes: Added to better document EMS workplace health and safety issues.
